Title: Men Vs Women
Writer: Fausto Brizzi (story and screenplay), Massimiliano Bruno (story and screenplay), Valeria Di Napoli (story and screenplay), Marco Martani (story and screenplay)
Actors: Paola Cortellesi, Fabio De Luigi, Lucia Ocone, Francesco Pannofino
Plot: The love lives of the friends Walter, Diego, Renato, Marcello and Piero.
